description:
Tyki Mikk, after http://anidb.net/ch7347 [Allen]`s failed attempt to exorcise the Noah inside him.
Tyki is fully awaken as a Noah, turns into a demonic knight and easily beats both Allen and http://anidb.net/ch7363 [Lavi]. They`ve managed to hold on until http://anidb.net/ch9409 [Cross Marian] entered the scene and confronted him instead. Just when Cross Marian was about to land the final blow, Tyki was saved by the http://anidb.net/ch9471 [Millennium Earl].
name: Tyki Mikk
